84054.summary: Some customers in Portage La Prairie are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
84054.title: Oct 23 - Portage La Prairie | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

84051.title: Oct 23 - Edmonton (Meadows) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
